quiz.question: In what year did World War I begin?
In what year did the Spanish Civil War begin?
When did Tokugawa Ieyasu achieve victory at Sekigahara, leading to Edo shogunate?
In what year did the Bolsheviks seize power in the October Revolution?
When did the Taiping Rebellion begin in China, one of the deadliest conflicts?
When did the Treaty of Nanking end the First Opium War, ceding Hong Kong to Britain?
In what year did the Bill of Rights become part of the U.S. Constitution?
In what year did the Treaty of Versailles formally end World War I?
When did the Battle of Chanakya's successors defeat the Seleucid forces leading to Mauryan expansion (approx.)?
When did Christopher Columbus first reach the Americas?
When did the Haitian Revolution successfully end in independence from France?
When was Constantinople officially renamed Istanbul by the Ottomans (de facto usage)?
When did the Ottoman Empire fall, formally ending after World War I?
When did the Meiji Restoration begin transforming Japan into a modern state?
In what year did the Council of Trent, shaping Catholic Counter-Reformation, begin?
